effect.red_blue: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.yellow: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.red_green_japan: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.blue_japan: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.red_blue: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.yellow: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.red_green_japan: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.blue_japan: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
